description:
Open any client, try uploading a profile picture. A modal pops up. Even if you close the modal, camera doesn't turn off.
See the marked red circle ( symbol for webcam ) in the screenshot below. You'd notice that modal is closed.

Refer the  following link for screenshots:
name: Mifos X Web App - Fix This : Camera Stays 'On' Even After Uploading A Captured Profile Picture
